name: This is a game that exists
name_original: This is a game that exists
description:
This is a game that exists is a story-based meta-game about a game-maker who doesn't know how to make games! It's freely inspired from the game "There is no game".

Throughout the story you will be met with different choices that will affect the story-line and bring you towards different finales.

At this point in time only the first chapter of the story is released! More chapters are already in development and will be ready to play soon!
